title: Backwerk
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Bakery, German, Take-out only, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a bakery chain which offers bagels, wraps, sandwiches, breads and b√∂rek (Turkish baked filled pastry). This one is at the train station Hauptbahnhof. Vegan items are labeled: whole wheat bread sandwich, guacamole bagel, falafel wrap.
